scripts.compile:auth:all: npm run compile:auth:client && npm run compile:auth:server
scripts.publish:auth:all: npm run publish:auth:client && npm run publish:auth:server
scripts.test:auth:all: npm run test:auth:client && npm run test:auth:server
scripts.lint:auth:all: npm run lint:auth:client && npm run lint:auth:server
scripts.compile:counter:all: npm run compile:counter:client && npm run compile:counter:server
scripts.publish:counter:all: npm run publish:counter:client && npm run publish:counter:server
scripts.test:counter:all: npm run test:counter:client && npm run test:counter:server
scripts.lint:counter:all: npm run lint:counter:client && npm run lint:counter:server
scripts.compile:notif:all: npm run compile:notif:client && npm run compile:notif:server
scripts.publish:notif:all: npm run publish:notif:client && npm run publish:notif:server
scripts.test:notif:all: npm run test:notif:client && npm run test:notif:server
scripts.lint:notif:all: npm run lint:notif:client && npm run lint:notif:server
scripts.compile:universal:all: npm run compile:universal && npm run compile:universal:server
scripts.publish:universal:all: npm run publish:universal && npm run publish:universal:server
scripts.test:universal:all: npm run test:universal && npm run test:universal:server
scripts.lint:universal:all: npm run lint:universal && npm run lint:universal:server
scripts.compile:all: npm run compile:universal:all && npm run compile:notif:all && npm run compile:auth:all && npm run compile:counter:all
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:auth:all && npm run publish:counter:all && npm run publish:notif:all && npm run publish:universal:all
scripts.test:all: npm run test:auth:all && npm run test:counter:all && npm run test:notif:all && npm run test:universal:all
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:auth:all && npm run lint:counter:all && npm run lint:notif:all && npm run lint:universal:all
